description: Applies a tag to an Amazon Web Services resource. Tags are key-value pairs that can help you manage, filter, and search for your resources. These include DataSync resources, such as locations, tasks, and task executions.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: Specifies the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource to apply the tag to.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: Specifies the tags that you want to apply to the resource. (dict) --- A key-value pair representing a single tag that's been applied to an Amazon Web Services resource. The key for an Amazon Web Services resource tag. Value (string) --- The value for an Amazon Web Services resource tag.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The key for an Amazon Web Services resource tag.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The value for an Amazon Web Services resource tag.
